content: आदृ {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> (द्रियते) {@--1@} To respect, honour, reverence; सीतां रघूत्तम भवत्स्थितिमाद्रियस्व <ls>Mv. 7. 3</ls> receive respectfully; take or receive respectfully; द्वितीयाद्रियते सदा <ls>H. Pr. 7</ls>; सर्वे तस्यादृता धर्मा यस्यैते त्रय आदृताः <ls>Ms. 2. 234</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 55.</ls> {@--2@} To heed or care for, mind, take notice of; usually with न; न त्यागमाद्रियते <ls>K. 104</ls>, <ls n="K.">167</ls>; वाक्यं नाद्रियते च बांधवजनः <ls>Bh. 3. 111</ls>; अनादृत्य disregarding; मम वचनमनादृत्य in spite of or notwithstanding my words. {@--3@} To feel timid from a feeling of respect, be awed. {@--4@} To apply or devote oneself closely to, have regard for; भूरि श्रुतं शाश्वतमाद्रियंते <ls>Māl. 1. 5.</ls> {@--5@} To desire, be eager for; <ls>Mv. 6. 3.</ls> {@--6@} To enjoy honour, be honoured.
